content:
Craft an item of type: black_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 12}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 26, "index": 14}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 37, "index": 24}, {"type": "cooked_porkchop", "quantity": 15, "index": 27}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 19, "index": 30}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "activator_rail", "quantity": 61, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_stained_glass", "quantity": 20, "index": 40}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 16, "index": 43}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft black_terracotta. Black_terracotta requires placing 8 terracotta blocks around a black dye block in the middle. Therefore I will first need to move the terracotta from slot 12 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Since the first terracotta has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the next terracotta to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the next terracotta to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1
